title: Incoming Software Engineering Intern
description: I will be working on the Fidelity Labs team, which is a group of engineers that work on new and innovative projects. I will be working on a project that will be focused on the Fidelity mobile app. I will be working on a team of 3-4 other interns and will be mentored by a senior engineer.
